full_threads.body:
@Victoria Victoria - lets run this through support@ next time for tracking.

This time, creating a separate ticket to track time.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Victoria Victoria <victoria@wolfiq.com.au>
Date: Wed, Jul 2, 2025 at 9:11 AM
Subject: Re: FW: Sendible - Facebook/Instagram issue
To: Jennifer Vander Molen <jennifer.vandermolen@acoufelt.com>
Cc: Criselda Romero | Acoufelt <Criselda.Romero@acoufelt.com>, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>, Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>


Hi Jennifer and Criselda,

I went back and had a look at the screenshot you sent.

The error showing that Jennifer is "no longer allowed to use Meta technologies" means her Facebook account has been restricted.

Because of that, Meta won't allow her to be added to the business or manage any assets.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best,
Victoria

***
Suggested solutions:
  • Visit business.facebook.com/accountquality to check and appeal the restriction, or
  • Use a different Facebook account that's in good standing with Meta.

From: Criselda Romero | Acoufelt <Criselda.Romero@acoufelt.com>
Sent: Thursday, 10 April 2025 3:36 PM
To: Evan Maher | Acoufelt <evan.maher@acoufelt.com>
Subject: Sendible - Facebook/Instagram issue

Hey Evan

Hope you and the fam are doing great and enjoying the time off! How's the dad life going? 😊

Sorry to bother and you can just have a look at this when you have a moment.

We have issues posting on Instagram as Sendible requires us to reconnect through the Facebook account to be able to post again.

I couldn't log in to Facebook and tried to reset our password but I keep getting the notification below and can't get past it. Katie also can't log in. We checked with Ben to see if he has access so he can reset it from his side but told me to check this with you.

Tried another way of logging in but it says that we need to log in on another device that was used from signing in before. I think I haven't log in to our Facebook as far as I can recall so maybe that's why?

Let me know my next steps when you can.

Thank you!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager

T: +61 1800 626 462
 acoufelt.com
